title: Sweet 'n Smokey Bacon Chicken
description: Bacon and chicken. This sounds like a win already, but add lots of savory spices and a chili powder-brown sugar mix and you won't know what hit ya. The perfect blend of sweet-smokey-spicy.
ingredients: 10 strips of bacon, sliced in half length-wise
instructions: Mix together salt, paprika, black pepper, onion powder,italian seasoning, and garlic powder
Wrap two sliced bacon strips around the chicken tender. Tuck in any loose ends.
Mix together brown sugar and chili powder.
Sprinkle chili-sugar mix over bacon-wrapped chicken, top and bottom. Press sugar mixture into chicken to pack it on.
Place chicken on a greased grill pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is done and bacon is crisp.
Optional: Broil for the last 5 minutes to make the bacon extra crispy.
Serve piping hot! Garnish with salt and parsley (if desired).
